title: Bledisloe Cup: Australia v New Zealand – Rugby Championship live
summary: The Wallabies face the All Blacks in Perth as they aim to get closer to winning the Rugby Championship. A minute-by-minute report details the match's progress. Jonathan Howcroft provides live updates on the unfolding action.

title: Leeds United v Tottenham Hotspur: Premier League – live
summary: Leeds faces off against Thomas Frank's team in a highly anticipated match. The outcome could serve as a significant statement for Leeds or continue Frank's successful run. Scott Murray is providing a minute-by-minute update on the unfolding action.

title: New Zealand v Australia: men’s third T20 international cricket – live
summary: James Wallace provides live updates on the match with an over-by-over report, delivering insights and highlights as the game progresses. Fans can stay informed on key moments and player performances. Tune in for real-time coverage of the action.

title: Manchester City v Arsenal: Women’s Super League – live
summary: A minute-by-minute report details a highly anticipated early-season clash between two prominent teams in the Women's Super League (WSL). Billy Munday covers the live updates and key moments as the match unfolds. Fans are eager to see who will emerge victorious in this competitive matchup.

title: Women’s Cricket World Cup: Australia v Sri Lanka – live
summary: Australia, having started strong against New Zealand, is set to face Sri Lanka on home ground. The match promises excitement as the Australian team looks to maintain their momentum. Join Megan Maurice for live updates and commentary.
